name: Kenyan AA
description: Delight in the bold flavors of Kenyan AA coffee, with its rich aroma and robust taste. Sourced from the highlands of Kenya, this coffee offers a unique and satisfying experience.

name: Guatemalan Antigua
description: Experience the smoothness and complexity of Guatemalan Antigua coffee, known for its well-balanced flavor profile and hints of chocolate and citrus.

name: Peruvian Organic
description: Indulge in the purity of Peruvian Organic coffee, grown in the lush valleys of the Andes. Enjoy its clean taste and floral undertones, while supporting sustainable farming practices.

name: Indonesian Sumatra Mandheling
description: Embark on a journey of exotic flavors with Indonesian Sumatra Mandheling coffee, featuring earthy notes and a full-bodied texture. Sourced from the volcanic soils of Sumatra.

name: Costa Rican Tarrazu
description: Revel in the smoothness of Costa Rican Tarrazu coffee, known for its bright acidity and clean finish. Grown in the renowned Tarrazu region, this coffee is a true delight.

name: Vietnamese Robusta
description: Experience the boldness of Vietnamese Robusta coffee, with its intense flavor and high caffeine content. Perfect for those who prefer a strong and invigorating brew.

name: Tanzanian Peaberry
description: Discover the uniqueness of Tanzanian Peaberry coffee, characterized by its small, round beans and bright, fruity notes. Sourced from the slopes of Mount Kilimanjaro.

name: Nicaraguan Jinotega
description: Savor the richness of Nicaraguan Jinotega coffee, grown in the fertile soils of Jinotega. Enjoy its smooth flavor with hints of cocoa and caramel, perfect for any coffee enthusiast.

name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
description: Experience the vibrant and floral notes of Ethiopian Yirgacheffe coffee, grown in the lush highlands of Ethiopia. This coffee offers a unique and aromatic taste experience.

name: Panamanian Geisha
description: Indulge in the luxury of Panamanian Geisha coffee, renowned for its exquisite flavor profile and floral aroma. Grown in the fertile soils of Panama, this coffee is a true gem.

name: Hawaiian Kona
description: Treat yourself to the smoothness of Hawaiian Kona coffee, with its rich flavor and buttery texture. Grown in the volcanic soil of Hawaii's Big Island, this coffee is a true indulgence.

name: Mexican Chiapas
description: Enjoy the richness of Mexican Chiapas coffee, with its smooth flavor and chocolatey undertones. Sourced from the Chiapas region of Mexico, this coffee is sure to delight your senses.

name: Indian Monsooned Malabar
description: Experience the unique taste of Indian Monsooned Malabar coffee, with its low acidity and full-bodied flavor. Aged through monsooning process, this coffee offers a distinctive and memorable experience.

name: Jamaican Blue Mountain
description: Indulge in the luxury of Jamaican Blue Mountain coffee, with its smooth and mild flavor profile. Grown in the Blue Mountains of Jamaica, this coffee is revered for its exceptional quality.

name: Rwandan Bourbon
description: Savor the rich and complex flavors of Rwandan Bourbon coffee, known for its wine-like acidity and fruity notes. Grown in the fertile soils of Rwanda, this coffee is a true gem of East Africa.

name: Yemeni Mocha
description: Experience the exotic taste of Yemeni Mocha coffee, with its rich and spicy flavor profile. Grown in the mountains of Yemen, this coffee is a true representation of Arabian coffee culture.
